name: NSCollectionLayoutSectionOrthogonalScrollingBehavior
desc: The scrolling behavior of the layout's sections in relation to the main layout axis.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The section does not allow users to scroll its content orthogonally.

items.name: case continuous
items.desc: The section allows users to scroll its content orthogonally with continuous scrolling.

items.name: case continuousGroupLeadingBoundary
items.desc: The section allows users to scroll its content orthogonally, coming to a natural stop at the leading boundary of the visible group.

items.name: case paging
items.desc: The section allows users to page its content orthogonally.

items.name: case groupPaging
items.desc: The section allows users to page its content orthogonally one group at a time.

items.name: case groupPagingCentered
items.desc: The section allows users to page its content orthogonally one group at a time, centering each group.
